sentences.en: A design flaw (= a mistake or weakness in the way something was made ) caused the engine to explode.
sentences.cn: 一个设计缺陷导致了引擎爆炸。

sentences.en: Beautiful scenery does not make up for the flaws of this film.
sentences.cn: 美丽的风光弥补不了此影片的不足。

sentences.en: Can you spot the flaw in their argument?
sentences.cn: 你能指出他们论点中的谬误 吗 ?

sentences.en: I can't quite put my finger on the flaw in her argument.
sentences.cn: 我看不出她的论点有何不妥.

sentences.en: It was a large diamond, but it had a flaw.
sentences.cn: 这是颗大钻石, 但它有一点瑕疵.
嫉妒是奥赛罗的主要弱点。

sentences.en: Location accurate to 5 feet of actual pipe flaw.
sentences.cn: 定位可精确到实际管道泄漏的5英尺范围内.

sentences.en: Pride was the greatest flaw in his personality.
sentences.cn: 傲慢是他品格上的最大缺陷.

sentences.en: The bubble is a flaw in the glass.
sentences.cn: 这个小气泡是这只玻璃杯的缺点.

sentences.en: The flaw in this stamp makes it less valuable.
sentences.cn: 这张邮票因为有点缺陷,不那么值钱.

sentences.en: The old man could hardly stand on his feet in the flaw.
sentences.cn: 老人在这阵狂风中几乎站不住了.

sentences.en: The only flaw in his character seems to be a short temper.
sentences.cn: 他性格中的唯一缺点好像就是脾气急。

sentences.en: The only flaw is the slightly slow response times when you press the buttons.
sentences.cn: 唯一的缺陷就是按键时反应略显迟缓。

sentences.en: The vase is not worthy since there are some flaw on it.
sentences.cn: 这个花瓶因为有点缺陷,不那么值钱了.

sentences.en: This arbitrary use of power wasn't merely a character flaw.
sentences.cn: 这种专横独断并不是(他)性格上的瑕疵.

sentences.en: This type of success was almost without flaw, as he saw it.
sentences.cn: 在他看来,这种成就简直是无懈可击.

sentences.en: Unfortunately, I found that your work had a tiny flaw.
sentences.cn: 很不幸，我发现你的作品有一处微小的瑕疵。

sentences.en: Why do you have the fond hope of finding a flaw in my reasoning?
sentences.cn: 干嘛你老爱在我讲的道理中挑毛病?

words.tran_cn: 完美的；无瑕疵的；无裂缝的
瑕疵，裂纹；缺点；一阵狂风
使无效；使破裂，使有缺陷

phrases.tran_cn: 缺陷回波；缺陷的回波信号；缺陷回声

trans.tran_en: a mistake, mark, or weakness that makes something imperfect

trans.tran_cn: 生裂缝； 变得有缺陷
trans.tran_en: to make or become blemished, defective, or imperfect
